In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Ryna's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Siem Reap province, Ryna who is aged 27, supports her family by farming rice. To supplement the income, she also raises pigs that she sells. Ryna has one daughter who is under school age. 

As she is short of funds, Ryna is leading a loan group comprised of four female members to apply for loans from VisionFund. She will spend her loan portion solely on her pig raising business doing things such as getting more piglets and feed. Ryna hopes to make more money so that she can save up for her kid's education.

loans.use: To buy piglets and pig feed.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Kagulube Group

texts.fr: Il y a huit bonnes années que Safari a commencé l'exploitation du café. C'est son pere qui l'y a initié car il a constaté que le café est rentable et cela pourrait aider son fils à couvrir certaines charges familiales Il est souvent buté à la difficulté de réunir de l'argent pour payer la main d'oeuvre, chose qui sera résolu cette foisci grâce à ce crédit Ceci aura également un impact sur sa productivité. Il pose sur la photo avec son épouse.
texts.en:
It has been eight good years since Safari started growing coffee. It was his father who introduced him to the business, because he knew it is profitable and it could help his son cover certain family expenses.

Safari often finds it difficult to gather the funds to pay for labor. This challenge will be resolved thanks to this loan. The loan will also improve productivity.

Safari is standing in the photo with his wife.

loans.use: to grow and harvest coffee

loans.name: Ran's Group

texts.en:
Ran’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Ran makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Mao's Group

texts.en:
Mao’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Mao makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Ley's Group

texts.en:
Ley’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Ley makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor at factory to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: La Union Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  La Unión está formado por 17 integrantes, están en  el 3° ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir en un nivel de pobreza extrema.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cecilia, quien en la encuesta que se le práctico esta en el nivel 2, es decir, está en un nivel medio, luchando por poder crecer y mejorar cada día su situación de vida. Ella hace y vende dulces de frutas de estación, como dulces de mamón, frutillas, ciruelas y otros más, siempre sus productos son muy ricos, y es por ello que siempre tiene muchos clientes que piden sus dulces. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que lucha y se esfuerza para poder crecer y salir adelante.
La Sra. Cecilia solicita de este préstamo para la compra de azúcar y frutas para poder hacer sus dulces, como ser manzanas, mamón, frutillas, y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group named La Unión is made up of 17 members. They are in their 3rd cycle of the women's committee program. All of them work and help each other to get ahead. They are also a part of the poverty elimination program, and all of them are below the poverty line. That is, they are at an extreme level of poverty.  

One of the members is Cecilia. The survey that was taken with her put her at level 2, that is, the average level, fighting to be able to grow and improve her life situation every day. She makes and sells sweets made from fruit such as mamon,  strawberries, plums and more. Her products are very delicious and that is why she always has customers who order her sweets. She is a very hardworking woman who struggles and strives to grow and get ahead. 

Cecilia is asking for this loan to buy sugar and fruit to make her sweets, such as apples, mamon, strawberries and more. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to grow and help her family.

loans.use: to buy sugar and fruit such as apples, mamon, strawberries and more.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, se dedica al comercio hace 6 años, está casado, y con la ayuda de su esposa se ha abierto camino y hoy día ya es muy conocido.
Se dedica a la venta de bolsas de plásticos, y con ello puede tener los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de bolsas varias, de manera a que pueda mejorar sus ingresos por medio de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Vicente is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. He has been making a living from trade for the past 6 years, is married and with the help of his wife has made his own way. Nowadays he is a well-known man.

He makes a living from the sale of plastic bags. Through this activity he earns the means to be able to help his family. He is a hard-working person and strives to get ahead.

He is requesting this loan to purchase varied bags, so that he can improve his income with his work.

loans.use: to buy varied bags for sale

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 43 years old and separated with four children. With four children currently in school, Alma works very hard to provide for them.

Alma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like beers, soft-drinks, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, biscuits, etc. to sell.

Alma has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as beers, soft-drinks, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, biscuits, etc. 

In the future, Alma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like beers, soft-drinks, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Jacquelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Jacquelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.  Jacquelyn is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell for her general store business.

Jacquelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.
